snippet: His Liberty Interactive will spin off two units, while Liberty Media will reclassify its common stock into three tracking stocks.
abstract: DealBook Online; John C Malone's Liberty Interactive Corporation will spin off two units in its Liberty Ventures Group.
lead_paragraph: His Liberty Interactive will spin off two units, while Liberty Media will reclassify its common stock into three tracking stocks.

headline.main: The Web of Deals That John Malone Weaves
